sentences.en: A dime is a tenth of a dollar.
sentences.cn: 一角银币是十分之一美元.

sentences.en: A dime is a tenth part of a dollar.
sentences.cn: 一角银币是一美元的十分之一.

sentences.en: He bought her a diamond ring on their tenth wedding anniversary.
sentences.cn: 他们结婚10周年纪念,他给她买了一枚钻戒.

sentences.en: He has just published his tenth novel.
sentences.cn: 他刚刚发表了他的第十本小说。

sentences.en: He plunged from a tenth floor window.
sentences.cn: 他从10楼的窗户跳下.

sentences.en: He was down on all cards at the middle of the tenth round.
sentences.cn: 到第十回合的中途,他在所有裁判记录卡上分数还是落后.

sentences.en: her tenth birthday
sentences.cn: 她的10岁生日

sentences.en: I wouldn't care to live on the tenth floor.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意住在第十层楼.

sentences.en: I'd like to book a seat to Munich for Monday the tenth.
sentences.cn: 我想订10号星期一飞往慕尼黑的机票一张.

sentences.en: in the tenth century
sentences.cn: 在10世纪

sentences.en: Its form up to a tenth degree polynomial is shown below.
sentences.cn: 下面写出一直到十次多项式的帕斯卡三角形.

sentences.en: Many already go for the second option: one-tenth of remittances to Africa come from within the continent.
sentences.cn: 很多人已经选择第二个选择了：十分之一汇向非洲国家的汇款来自欧洲国家。

sentences.en: Not because she lost, in fact she just won her last election to her tenth term by a landslide.
sentences.cn: 不只因为她的失败，事实上她只是由于占绝对优势的选举赢得第十期最后的选举。

sentences.en: Over a tenth of the population have secure, undemanding jobs.
sentences.cn: 超过1/10的人口拥有稳定且相对轻松的工作。

sentences.en: That makes the tenth time he's failed his driving test!
sentences.cn: 他驾驶测验不及格,这次算第十次了!

sentences.en: The elevator broke down and we had to walk up the tenth floor.
sentences.cn: 电梯坏了,我们只好走到十层.

sentences.en: The leading car crashed midway through the tenth lap.
sentences.cn: 领先的那辆赛车在第十圈的中途撞毁了.

sentences.en: The Parliament was prorogued to the tenth of February.
sentences.cn: 国会休会到2月10日.

sentences.en: The Society is celebrating its tenth anniversary this year.
sentences.cn: 这个协会今年将举办成立10周年庆典。

sentences.en: This is my tenth year of working with students with autism.
sentences.cn: 这是我教授患有孤独症的学生们的第十个年头。

sentences.en: What are you doing on the tenth of May?
sentences.cn: 你5月10日有空 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: coming after nine other things in a series
one of ten equal parts of something
one of ten equal parts of something
